root.title: restaur associ inc ra 4th qtr jan 3
root.body: shr 25 ct v 36 ct net 1.4 mln v 1.4 mln rev 56.9 mln v 35.1 mln year shr 86 ct v 75 ct net 4.7 mln v 3 mln rev 201.4 mln v 140 mln note:1985 4th qtr includ 99,000 loss carryforward share restat give effect 1.4 one stock split form 40 pct class dividend august 1985
